note: The Envelope People offer an impressive selection of envelopes, tailored to meet a diverse range of needs with their variety of sizes, colours, and materials. Committed to supporting UK suppliers and the crafting industry, they ensure their products uphold high standards of quality and local craftsmanship. Customers can choose from an array of options, including vibrant colours, pearlescent finishes, and paper weights like 100gsm and 120gsm, perfect for greeting cards, business mailings.
